title: Anne's Legacy
creator_contributor_role: Hector Waldron Pride Charitable Trust, partner
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Melbourne Legacy
abstract: Dulcie was taught a valuable lesson by her daughter, Anne, that there is no need to be lonely.
description: Encouraged by her daughter, Anne, to get out there and keep busy, Dulcie started to volunteer. Through the volunteer work, Dulcie remembered her time at Legacy when she was 12 and decided to join up again. This restored her quality of life and brought her back in contact with the community that would provide support after Anne died.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001776; Living Legacy : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2009
